Articles.Content:
So I decided to record a mission to my space station, and messing around with some space scooters.

I haven't seen anybody abusing the ISS song yet, so it had to be done...

I just love the capsule interiors with the Kerbals in absolute terror

It's a bit annoying that in "hide ui" mode not everything is hidden, like the glowing green component highlighting and several text messages like time warp etc. Of course you'll only notice them after the rendering is done and throwing away all camera paths...

KSP really needs a proper replay mode.
